comments.author: dwayne@translate.org.za
comments.text:
I'm using a Vodafone 3G wireless router created by Huawei.  All the configuration pages are not displaying correctly.  I used Safari to validate that they are displaying on that browser.  But for Fx4 I'm seeing nothing.


Version information from the router:
------------------------------------
Version
Boot Loader Version:	
256.11.10.05.105sp03
 
  		 
Router Hardware Version:	
WLA1GAPU
 
Router Software Version:	
256.11.10.05.105sp03
 
Release At:	
Sep 9 2008 11:41:37
 
  		 
Modem Hardware Version:	
WLA3TCPU
 
Modem Software Version:	
256.11.10.04.111
comments.creator: dwayne@translate.org.za
